title: Something not Right with the Wins/Losses Since Update
body:
Just played my 1st game since the last patch and only received +9lp for the win. Also the other team received a loss prevention for no reason at all.

Perhaps a bug, but something isn't right. Multiple people commenting on it in the post game lobby so it's not just me.

replies.body:
There was obviously some issues pn riots end so they activated loss prevented. 

When loss prevented is active yhe team wo wons recieves less lp and the losing team loses none.

Even if you had no in game issues many others could have been experiencing some.
